insuficiencia-cardiaca.title: Heart Failure
insuficiencia-cardiaca.definition: Clinical syndrome characterized by the heart's inability to pump sufficient blood to meet the metabolic needs of tissues, or to do so only with elevated filling pressures.

hipertensao-arterial.title: Systemic Arterial Hypertension
hipertensao-arterial.definition: Multifactorial clinical condition characterized by sustained elevation of blood pressure levels ≥140/90 mmHg. It is the main modifiable risk factor for cardiovascular, cerebrovascular, and renal diseases.

diabetes-mellitus-tipo-2.title: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
diabetes-mellitus-tipo-2.definition: Metabolic disorder characterized by chronic hyperglycemia resulting from insulin resistance and/or relative deficiency in insulin secretion.

asma.title: Asthma
asma.definition: Chronic inflammatory disease of the airways characterized by reversible obstruction and bronchial hyperresponsiveness.

doenca-pulmonar-obstrutiva-cronica.title: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
doenca-pulmonar-obstrutiva-cronica.definition: Pulmonary disease characterized by chronic airflow obstruction, usually progressive and not fully reversible.

dpoc.title: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
dpoc.definition: Preventable and treatable chronic respiratory disease, characterized by persistent airflow limitation, usually progressive and associated with chronic inflammatory response of the airways and lungs to harmful particles or gases.

hipotireoidismo.title: Hypothyroidism
hipotireoidismo.definition: Clinical syndrome resulting from deficiency of thyroid hormones (T3 and T4), with consequent generalized slowing of metabolic processes.

obesidade.title: Obesity
obesidade.definition: Chronic disease characterized by excessive accumulation of body fat, with negative repercussions on health. Defined by BMI ≥30 kg/m².

doenca-refluxo-gastroesofagico.title: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease
doenca-refluxo-gastroesofagico.definition: Condition that develops when reflux of gastric contents causes bothersome symptoms and/or complications. Typical manifestations: heartburn and regurgitation.

sindrome-intestino-irritavel.title: Irritable Bowel Syndrome
sindrome-intestino-irritavel.definition: Functional gastrointestinal disorder characterized by recurrent abdominal pain associated with altered bowel habits, without identifiable organic cause.

infeccao-trato-urinario.title: Urinary Tract Infection
infeccao-trato-urinario.definition: Bacterial infection of the urinary tract, classified as cystitis (lower) or pyelonephritis (upper). E. coli is the agent in 80-90% of uncomplicated cases.

faringoamigdalite.title: Acute Pharyngotonsillitis
faringoamigdalite.definition: Acute inflammation of the pharynx and/or tonsils. Etiology viral (70-80%) or bacterial (15-30%, mainly Streptococcus pyogenes - GAS).

fibrilacao-atrial.title: Atrial Fibrillation
fibrilacao-atrial.definition: Supraventricular arrhythmia characterized by disorganized, irregular, and rapid atrial activation, with loss of effective atrial contraction. It is the most common sustained arrhythmia.

doenca-arterial-coronariana.title: Stable Coronary Artery Disease
doenca-arterial-coronariana.definition: Atherosclerotic obstruction of the coronary arteries leading to myocardial ischemia during exertion or stress. Characterized by typical predictable angina, stable in frequency and intensity.

pneumonia-comunitaria.title: Community-Acquired Pneumonia
pneumonia-comunitaria.definition: Acute infection of the lung parenchyma acquired outside the hospital setting, characterized by acute respiratory symptoms and new pulmonary infiltrate on radiography.

depressao.title: Major Depressive Disorder
depressao.definition: Mood disorder characterized by episodes of depressed mood or loss of interest/pleasure, accompanied by cognitive, neurovegetative, and psychomotor symptoms.

lombalgia.title: Low Back Pain
lombalgia.definition: Pain localized in the lumbar region, between the last rib and the gluteal fold, with or without radiation to the lower limbs.

enxaqueca.title: Migraine
enxaqueca.definition: Recurrent primary headache characterized by episodes of pulsating pain, usually unilateral, of moderate to severe intensity, associated with nausea, photophobia, and phonophobia. May be preceded by aura.

cefaleia-tensional.title: Tension-Type Headache
cefaleia-tensional.definition: Most common primary headache. Pressure/tightening pain, bilateral, mild to moderate, without significant nausea, without worsening with physical activity.

dermatite-atopica.title: Atopic Dermatitis
dermatite-atopica.definition: Chronic, relapsing, intensely pruritic inflammatory skin disease characterized by epidermal barrier dysfunction and exacerbated Th2 immune response.

psoriase.title: Psoriasis
psoriase.definition: Chronic, immune-mediated, systemic inflammatory disease characterized by well-defined erythematous-desquamative plaques.

osteoartrite.title: Osteoarthritis
osteoartrite.definition: Degenerative joint disease characterized by deterioration of articular cartilage, subchondral bone changes, and secondary synovial inflammation.

fibromialgia.title: Fibromyalgia
fibromialgia.definition: Generalized chronic pain syndrome associated with fatigue, sleep disturbances, cognitive dysfunction, and multiple somatic symptoms.

doenca-renal-cronica.title: Chronic Kidney Disease
doenca-renal-cronica.definition: Abnormality of kidney structure or function present for >3 months, with implications for health. Defined by eGFR <60 mL/min/1.73m² and/or markers of kidney damage.

nefrolitiase.title: Nephrolithiasis
nefrolitiase.definition: Presence of calculi in the urinary tract (kidneys, ureter, bladder). Calcium oxalate is the most common (70-80%). Colicky pain is the cardinal symptom.

sindrome-ovarios-policisticos.title: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
sindrome-ovarios-policisticos.definition: Heterogeneous endocrine-metabolic disorder characterized by hyperandrogenism, ovarian dysfunction, and polycystic ovarian morphology.

vulvovaginite-candidíase.title: Vulvovaginal Candidiasis
vulvovaginite-candidíase.definition: Vulvovaginal infection caused by yeasts of the genus Candida (mainly C. albicans). Characterized by intense vulvar pruritus, white curd-like discharge, and external dysuria.

anemia-ferropriva.title: Iron Deficiency Anemia
anemia-ferropriva.definition: Anemia caused by iron deficiency, the most common type of anemia worldwide. Characterized by microcytic and hypochromic red blood cells.

anemia-megaloblastica.title: Megaloblastic Anemia
anemia-megaloblastica.definition: Macrocytic anemia caused by deficient DNA synthesis, usually due to vitamin B12 or folic acid deficiency.

rinite-alergica.title: Allergic Rhinitis
rinite-alergica.definition: IgE-mediated inflammation of the nasal mucosa triggered by allergens. Symptoms: rhinorrhea, sneezing, nasal pruritus, congestion.

tosse-cronica.title: Chronic Cough
tosse-cronica.definition: Persistent cough for >8 weeks. Main causes: post-nasal drip syndrome, asthma, GERD, ACE inhibitor use.

acne-vulgar.title: Acne Vulgaris
acne-vulgar.definition: Chronic inflammatory dermatosis of the pilosebaceous follicle. Common in adolescents. Lesions: comedones, papules, pustules, nodules.

impetigo.title: Impetigo
impetigo.definition: Superficial bacterial skin infection. Causes: S. aureus, S. pyogenes. Lesions: vesicles/pustules that evolve into honey-colored crusts.

otite-media-aguda.title: Acute Otitis Media
otite-media-aguda.definition: Acute infection of the middle ear. Common in children <5 years. Symptoms: otalgia, fever, irritability. May have otorrhea if tympanic membrane perforated.

cerume-impactado.title: Impacted Cerumen
cerume-impactado.definition: Excessive accumulation of cerumen in the external auditory canal, causing obstruction and symptoms such as hearing loss and aural fullness.

incontinencia-urgencia.title: Urgency Urinary Incontinence
incontinencia-urgencia.definition: Involuntary loss of urine associated with urinary urgency. Cause: involuntary detrusor contractions (overactive bladder).

neuropatia-periferica.title: Peripheral Neuropathy
neuropatia-periferica.definition: Injury to peripheral nerves. Symptoms: paresthesia, tingling, burning, weakness, pain. Causes: diabetes, nutritional deficiencies, toxins.

gastroenterite-viral.title: Viral Gastroenteritis
gastroenterite-viral.definition: Viral infection of the gastrointestinal tract. Causes: rotavirus, norovirus, adenovirus. Symptoms: diarrhea, vomiting, nausea, abdominal pain.

bocio-simples.title: Simple Goiter
bocio-simples.definition: Diffuse enlargement of the thyroid gland without hyperthyroidism or hypothyroidism. Normal thyroid function. Causes: iodine deficiency, genetic factors.

gastrite.title: Gastritis and Dyspepsia
gastrite.definition: Gastritis: inflammation of the gastric mucosa. Dyspepsia: symptoms of epigastric pain/discomfort without identifiable organic cause (functional) or secondary to disease (organic).

conjuntivite.title: Conjunctivitis
conjuntivite.definition: Inflammation of the conjunctiva. Viral (most common), bacterial, or allergic. Highly contagious if infectious.

transtorno-ansiedade-generalizada.title: Generalized Anxiety Disorder
transtorno-ansiedade-generalizada.definition: Excessive and persistent anxiety and worry about various events or activities, occurring most days for at least 6 months.

constipacao.title: Constipation
constipacao.definition: Infrequent bowel movements (<3x/week) or difficulty defecating. May be functional or secondary.

hipertireoidismo.title: Hyperthyroidism
hipertireoidismo.definition: Excess of thyroid hormones. Graves' disease (autoimmune) is the most common cause (70-80%).

artrite-reumatoide.title: Rheumatoid Arthritis
artrite-reumatoide.definition: Symmetric inflammatory polyarthritis. Systemic autoimmune disease. May have extra-articular manifestations.

gota.title: Gout
gota.definition: Inflammatory arthropathy caused by deposition of monosodium urate crystals in joints and periarticular tissues, associated with chronic hyperuricemia.

sinusite-aguda.title: Acute Sinusitis
sinusite-aguda.definition: Inflammation of the paranasal sinuses, usually viral. Duration <4 weeks. Bacterial if symptoms >10 days or worsening after initial improvement.

bronquite-aguda.title: Acute Bronchitis
bronquite-aguda.definition: Inflammation of the bronchi lasting <3 weeks. Usually viral (90%). Cough may persist 2-3 weeks.

olho-seco.title: Dry Eye Syndrome
olho-seco.definition: Multifactorial disease of the ocular surface with tear film instability. Prevalence increases with age and screen use.
